resources.string: If app already installed,\n uninstall it first
(if you got NOT EXISTS error use custom file manager to select file)
Enable if you use Oppo, Realme or OnePlus phone

Use \"Reset Default\" button to open default Google PackageInstaller if you wrongly set as default and popup won\'t show anymore. After touch \"Reset Default\" button, search for \"Clear Default Preference\" PS if button give an error is because your phone use a different PackageInstaller and so you need to manually search on your phone setting
